maroon: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
grey: If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success.
blue: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
orange: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
green: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
apricot: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
avocado: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
blackberry: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
mango: The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me
lychee: You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you don't try.
